author: mrmitch
title: Sand Racer - Big Car
review: This set is cool because it is different. The wheels are big and the car is built up off the ground for rolling over rocks and stuff. Lot of detail in this model and the driver looks cool. Car does roll well on carpet due to the oversized wheels. Good solid set - fun to play around with.

author: smiley905
title: nice car
review:
this is a very good car, mine came with crome exhaust pipes and i like the wheels and the spoiler on the back. the mf is nice and has a cool flame helmet. it does have the minor details such as the headlights and antena at the back

a nice set but not the best it could have been

author: hustla187
title: Fun 4x4
review: This is a really nice vehicle to have in your Lego collection. The wheels are very cool, and the windshield is pretty nice also. The Extreme Team was a good theme, and this set showed us why it is. 5 out of 5.

author: Wolfagar
title: Great set!
review: I give a 5 to this set! It is excellent, nice work, pipes do it great, the minifig is awesome! design an functionallity are the way that should be! also this set put me in the road of lego again! thanx to my friend that gave it to me!

author: Gus_263
title: Awesome
review: Sets of cars like this are awesome and very useful to creations. The theme is of adventure cars, but i recommend it to build cars of various themes. It include some stuffs, the minifigure and its helmet, big wheels, colorful pieces, and other acessories for crations. I rate it 5/5.

author: Brock_the_Builder
title: Sweet Little Buggy
review: I just put this set together today.  It was quick and easy, but the car has some cool features.  The spoiler is infinitely adjustable.  The antenna tilts.  The driver is super cool.  The chrome exhaust pipes are also a nice touch.  Lastly, the wheels roll smoothly and are a perfect size.  This car is so cool, it could go with Town or Space theme.  I give it a 5.

author: WiseWarrior
title: Very well thought out
review: I have an amazing amount of Lego sets that are cars, even though I don't love cars all that much...weird. Anyway, this is a really great one. It looks very cool, and drives even better. The translucent green brick goes up so the driver can get out, and the back bends up and down to. It's not a HUGE car, but it sure is a good one!

author: Atbin7856
title: An awesome set
review:
Extreme team racers are my favorite racing theme next to Racers. Here's my review:

Pros:
The mini figure is great!
Has a sticker for the upper panel.
Also it has firm tires!
Great build over all

Cons: 
No cons!

author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Town (Extreme Team) - Extreme Team Racer Review
review:
This is a fun set to have and it's fun to play with as well. The build is very nice and easy and we also a sticker to put on. The windscreen opens very easily and the minifig can fit in very well as well. The antenna and the rear wing can sviwel, too. This set has some cool looking pieces like the chrome exhaust pipe on each side. I also like the design which LEGO has chosen for this model. As I told you in the beginning: It's a fun set to have - even for pieces which you can use for future MOC's (My own creations) and/or brickfilms for sure.

All in all this set is an great set and I would recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure. Here is the link where you can check out the full gallery I made for this set on my website: http://www.klokriecher.de

Videos I made of this set:

Stopmotion
Review

author: Planetsbend
title: Cool set to have in your collection.
review: I received this set for my birthday and I was overjoyed. I built it right away and couldn't get my hands off of it. This is a great set for children, if you can find it on ebay then buy it.

author: Studded_Dud
title: Extreme Team Racer
review: This is a great set for a great value! The side bar pieces are amazing and so is the minifigure! The car in general is a nice thing to have in any type of collection and is also a really fun build! Anyone who likes car sets or even just Legos will like this set.
